title: Set up a Node
body: Since Dash Platform is accessible through DAPI, running a node is typically unnecessary. The information provided in this section is for advanced users interested in running their own network for development or participating in testing the project by running a testnet node.
body_html: Since Dash Platform is accessible through DAPI, running a node is typically unnecessary. The information provided in this section is for advanced users interested in running their own network for development or participating in testing the project by running a testnet node.
